Crimes.Legal_Issue: Genuineness of marriage and procedural fairness
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of immigration officer's decision
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Discrepancies in interview responses affected credibility
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Sections of IRPA and Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (IRPR) regarding genuine relationships
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage not genuine, potential immigration fraud
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Inconsistencies in couple's accounts of wedding date and living arrangements
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Procedural fairness and reasonableness under administrative law
Crimes.Application_Factor: Marriage assessed for genuineness under immigration rules
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether officer breached procedural fairness or made unreasonable findings
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA and IRPR - Genuine relationship requirements
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Suspected sham marriage based on inconsistencies and anonymous tip
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Reliance on inconsistent testimony and unverified anonymous information
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Significant discrepancies in personal details between partners
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Applicant argued minor discrepancies and challenged procedural fairness
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Sufficiency of reasons and fairness in assessment process

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Genuineness of marriage and sufficiency of officer's reasoning
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of refusal based on marriage fraud allegations
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Lack of intimacy indicators and inconsistent answers
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage entered primarily for immigration purposes
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Discrepancies in wedding date and cohabitation details
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied to administrative decisions
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Procedural fairness and justification of decision
Crimes.Application_Factor: Assessment of marital authenticity under immigration regulations
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Sufficiency of reasons provided by officer
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Alleged fake marriage supported by interview inconsistencies and tip
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Use of anonymous tip and weight given to interview discrepancies
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Inconsistent statements about key marital facts
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to adequacy of reasons and fairness
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Adequacy of explanation in administrative decision
